meanings.sent1: The corky coasters were light and bouncy.
meanings.sent2: The corky tree had a rough texture.
meanings.sent3: The corky hat floated on the water like a boat.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a corky quality that made it stand out.
meanings.sent5: The corky material absorbed the liquid quickly.

meanings.definition: Having a cork-like texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The corky floor felt soft under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The corky bottle stopper fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The corky shoes squeaked with each step.
meanings.sent4: The corky clouds floated lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The corky texture of the wall reminded me of a bulletin board.

meanings.definition: Quirky or eccentric in a charming way.
meanings.sent1: Her corky sense of humor always made us laugh.
meanings.sent2: The corky decorations added a fun touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The corky cat danced around the room on its hind legs.
meanings.sent4: His corky ideas sparked creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The corky character in the story brought joy to the readers.
